description: Led development of customer-facing dashboard using Angular and PrimeNG. Implemented responsive design patterns and optimized application performance. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards.
Developed and maintained web applications using Angular and Node.js. Built RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time.
Created responsive web applications for various clients. Worked with React and Vue.js frameworks. Implemented modern UI/UX designs and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
